A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Incredibly stupid. Who would rate this a 91. It was kind of like watching Spaceballs. The characters were all caricatures.  The first scene where the rebel bombers have to 'drop' bombs...huh? They are in space; bombs don't 'fall'! And the 200' foot spear to catch a fish while standing on a narrow ledge. Well I guess it's a piece of cake cause he is the 'last jedi'.
